Klasse AdminCal

java.lang.Object
com.wegapplikation.config.controller.AdminCal
public class AdminCal extends Object
The AdminCal class provides administrative functionalities for managing users, rooms, and floors within the application. It acts as a controller, interacting with the underlying data models (UserData, RoomData, FloorData).

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    AdminCal()
    Constructs an AdminCal object and initializes the data model objects for users, rooms, and floors.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • AdminCal

      public AdminCal()
      Constructs an AdminCal object and initializes the data model objects for users, rooms, and floors.

  • Methodendetails

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String username, String password, String role)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameter:
      username - The username of the new user.
      password - The password for the new user.
      role - The role assigned to the new user (e.g., "Admin", "User").
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided username is already taken.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(String oldUsername, String username, String password, String role)
      Updates an existing user's details.
      Parameter:
      oldUsername - The current username of the user to be updated.
      username - The new username.
      password - The new password.
      role - The new role.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the new username is different from the old one and is already taken by another user.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes a user from the system based on their username.
      Parameter:
      username - The username of the user to delete.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<Object[]> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users, with the password masked as "*****" if the user's role is "Admin".
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of Object arrays, where each array contains [username, masked_password, role].

    • getUserByUsername

      public Object[] getUserByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves the unmasked data for a specific user.
      Parameter:
      username - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Gibt zurück:
      An array containing [username, password, role] for the user, or null if the user is not found.

    • updateRoom

      public void updateRoom(int oldId, int newId, String designation, boolean locked)
      Updates an existing room's details. Note: The addRoom method is missing, but this method handles updates.
      Parameter:
      oldId - The current ID of the room to be updated.
      newId - The new ID for the room.
      designation - The new designation (name/description) for the room.
      locked - The new lock status for the room.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the new ID is different from the old one and is already taken by another room.

    • getAllRooms

      public List<Object[]> getAllRooms()
      Retrieves a list of all rooms in the system.
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of Object arrays, where each array contains [id, designation, locked].

    • verifyPassword

      public boolean verifyPassword(String username, String password)
      Verifies if the provided password matches the stored password for the given username.
      Parameter:
      username - The username to verify.
      password - The password to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the password is correct, false otherwise.

    • addFloor

      public void addFloor(int id, boolean locked)
      Adds a new floor to the system.
      Parameter:
      id - The unique ID of the new floor.
      locked - The initial lock status of the new floor.

    • updateFloor

      public void updateFloor(int oldId, int newId, boolean locked)
      Updates an existing floor's ID and lock status.
      Parameter:
      oldId - The current ID of the floor to be updated.
      newId - The new ID for the floor.
      locked - The new lock status for the floor.

    • deleteFloor

      public void deleteFloor(int id)
      Deletes a floor from the system based on its ID.
      Parameter:
      id - The ID of the floor to delete.

    • getAllFloors

      public List<Object[]> getAllFloors()
      Retrieves a list of all floors in the system.
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of Object arrays, where each array contains [id, locked].

    • LogoutTimer

      public void LogoutTimer()
      Placeholder method for handling the logout timer functionality. Its implementation is currently empty.
